00178 inline bool CFastColor::EnsureElementsCount(int count, double value)
00179 {
00180        if (count > GetElementsCount()){
00181               return SetElementsCount(count, value);
00182        }
00183 
00184        return true;
00185 }

00188 inline bool CFastColor::IsSimilar(const CFastColor& color, double tolerance) const
00189 {
00190        return GetDistance(color) <= tolerance;
00191 }

00194 inline bool CFastColor::IsNormalized() const
00195 {
00196        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00197 
00198        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00199               double component = m_elements[i];
00200 
00201               if ((component < 0) || (component > 1)){
00202                      return false;
00203               }
00204        }
00205 
00206        return true;
00207 }

00224 inline bool CFastColor::operator==(const CFastColor& vector) const
00225 {
00226        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00227 
00228        if (elementsCount != vector.GetElementsCount()){
00229               return false;
00230        }
00231 
00232        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00233               if (qAbs(operator[](i) - vector[i]) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00234                      return false;
00235               }
00236        }
00237 
00238        return true;
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 inline bool CFastColor::operator!=(const CFastColor& vector) const
00243 {
00244        return !operator==(vector);
00245 }

00248 inline bool CFastColor::operator<(const CFastColor& vector) const
00249 {
00250        int commonSize = qMin(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00251 
00252        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00253               if (operator[](i) > vector[i] + I_BIG_EPSILON){
00254                      return false;
00255               }
00256               else if (operator[](i) < vector[i] - I_BIG_EPSILON){
00257                      return true;
00258               }
00259        }
00260 
00261        return GetElementsCount() < vector.GetElementsCount();
00262 }
00263

00297 inline bool CFastColor::operator>=(const CFastColor& vector) const

00299        int commonSize = qMin(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());

00305                      return false;

00353 inline CFastColor CFastColor::operator*(double value) const
00354 {
00355        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00356 
00357        CFastColor retVal(elementsCount);
00358 
00359 #ifdef COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT
00360        for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT; ++i){
00361 #else
00362        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00363 #endif // COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT
00364               retVal.m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] * value;
00365        }
00366 
00367        return retVal;
00368 }

00390 {

00393        Q_ASSERT(m_elementsCount <= COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT);

00400 #endif // COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT
00401 
00402        return *this;

00406 inline const CFastColor& CFastColor::operator+=(const CFastColor& color)
00407 {

00409        m_elementsCount = qMax(m_elementsCount, color.m_elementsCount);
00410        Q_ASSERT(m_elementsCount <= COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT);
00411 
00412        for (int i = 0; i < COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT; ++i){
00413               m_elements[i] += color.m_elements[i];
00414        }
00415 #else

00417 #endif // COLOR_COMPONENTS_COUNT
